experience: You and Diane both know Anders Tyslan, Diana Cheng-Lau, and 21 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Direct daily operations of facilities management for a portfolio consisting of 834,000 square feet of three corporate buildings, 18,000 square feet of retail space and oversight of twelve Bay Area branches.  Oversight of eight Facilities Coordinators and Building Engineers.  Provide capital and expense budget management ($7.5 M).  Conduct site inspections and prepare retail investment strategy.  Manage building renovations and moves of up to 150+ workstations.  Maintain customer satisfaction in excess of 95%.

Researched and negotiated vendor contracts to reduce costs and improve services for contracts ranging upwards of $350K.  Managed technology: voice, data and TV building installations.  Assisted with negotiation of leases for nine retail tenants.  Oversaw sustainability, ergonomic program, fire life safety training and OSHA compliance.

Reviewed core product releases, collateral white papers and customer case studies to produce software guide.  Managed product roadmap and marketing deliverables for Marketing Managers.  Approved documents for WebSphere Commerce Knowledge Base website.  Developed and promoted MBA consortium for first year Harvard, MIT and Georgetown students.
IT Project Manager, Staff Systems Administrator

Provided project leadership for network, voice and system support professionals.  Documented project requirements, present sizing estimates and negotiate client expectations.  Managed scope of scheduled work, track performance metrics of technical resources to achieve milestone dates and generate Remedy billing reports.  Upgraded and installed call center applications (Aspect, ACD/Hunt Group and Nicelog) for new San Francisco buildings.  Received "Spot Award" for setting up Web-based server for Retail Technology Department.
Director of Marketing and Director of Professional Services. Asian Business Association
Sort and box weekly produce and vegetable donations.  Assemble 1-pound bags of pasta and rice for families in need.
recommendations: Joan Jiang
Dynamic Compliance Professional
November 7, 2017, Joan worked with Diane in different groups

Diane is one of the hardest working people I know. I was impressed by her professionalism, passion and strive for perfection during my tenure at Charles Schwab Investment Management, and more recently when she was part of the team that moved the entire department to brand new floor in a new building. She was instrumental in moving the entire department of over 200 people to a new building. She paid attention to all the details and ensured that our suggestions were heard and requests were addressed timely.My interactions with Diane continued through Toastmasters. Diane was always a team player, supportive and a good speaker. She took over my position as President of the Club and transitioned with ease into the leadership position.
